description.zh-cn: 中国持不同政见者，1989年六四事件的学生领袖之一，被北京市公安局列为21名通缉学生领袖之一。曾任北京高校学生自治联合会主席、保卫天安门广场总指挥部副总指挥。后流亡海外，获得高等研究应用学院博士学位，现居美国旧金山。
description.en: A Chinese dissident, one of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, and was listed as one of the 21 most-wanted student leaders by the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau. He served as the chairman of the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation and deputy commander-in-chief of the Headquarters for Defending Tiananmen Square. He later went into exile, earned a Ph.D. from École Pratique des Hautes Études, and currently resides in San Francisco, USA.

description.zh-cn: 中国持不同政见者，1989年六四事件的学生领袖之一，封从德的前妻。
description.en: A Chinese dissident, one of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, and the ex-wife of Feng Congde.

description.zh-cn: 1989年在中国北京发生的一系列学生和民众抗议活动，最终以政府武力清场告终。
description.en: A series of student and popular protests that took place in Beijing, China in 1989, which ended with a violent government crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名高等学府，封从德的母校。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher learning in China, and Feng Congde's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 法国巴黎的一所高等研究机构，封从德在此获得博士学位。
description.en: An advanced research institution in Paris, France, where Feng Congde obtained his Ph.D.

description.en: An autonomous organization established by university students in Beijing during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, of which Feng Congde was the chairman.

description.zh-cn: 负责中国北京市公共安全的政府机构。六四事件后通缉了封从德等21名学生领袖。
description.en: The government agency responsible for public security in Beijing, China. It issued arrest warrants for 21 student leaders, including Feng Congde, after the Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰汉学家，封从德在高等研究应用学院的导师。
description.en: A Dutch sinologist who was Feng Congde's supervisor at the École Pratique des Hautes Études.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰的一所著名大学，封从德曾于此研究儒家学说。
description.en: A famous university in the Netherlands where Feng Congde once researched Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 由封从德于2001年创建的网站，收录关于六四事件的文字、图片、音视频等资料。
description.en: A website founded by Feng Congde in 2001, which archives documents, photos, audio, and video materials related to the Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 由封从德于2011年创办的网络学校。
description.en: An online school founded by Feng Congde in 2011.

description.zh-cn: 一个旨在推动中国民主的教育项目，封从德是其复校筹备组成员并主持该项目。
description.en: An educational project aimed at promoting democracy in China, for which Feng Congde is a member of the preparatory group for its re-establishment and currently presides over.

description.en: A memoir written by Feng Congde detailing his experiences during the Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国持不同政见者，1989年六四事件的学生领袖之一。

description.en: Feng Congde is a pro-Republic of China activist, advocating for mainland China to return to the Republic of China.

description.en: A private research university in Boston, USA.

description.en: A group of students who conducted a hunger strike in Tiananmen Square during the 1989 protests.

description.zh-cn: 1989年六四事件期间学生成立的领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the leading bodies established by students during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国北京市的行政管理机关，于1989年6月8日解散高自联。
description.en: The administrative body of Beijing Municipality, China, which dissolved the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation on June 8, 1989.

description.zh-cn: 历史学家，为封从德的著作《六四日记——广场上的共和国》写序。
description.en: A historian who wrote the preface for Feng Congde's book 'June Fourth Diary: The Republic on the Square'.

description.zh-cn: 封从德出生于中国四川省。
description.en: Feng Congde was born in Sichuan Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 封从德与柴玲于1988年5月结婚，六四事件后二人共同流亡，后于1990年离婚。
description.en: Feng Congde and Chai Ling married in May 1988, went into exile together after the Tiananmen Square protests, and later divorced in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 1982年入读北京大学，后因成绩优秀被保送至该校遥感技术应用研究所继续学习。
description.en: He was admitted to Peking University in 1982 and was later recommended for postgraduate studies at the university's Institute of Remote Sensing and GIS Application due to his excellent academic performance.

description.zh-cn: 流亡法国后，在高等研究应用学院宗教历史系学习，先后于1995年获得硕士文凭，2003年获得博士学位。
description.en: After going into exile in France, he studied in the Department of Religious History at the École Pratique des Hautes Études, obtaining a master's diploma in 1995 and a Ph.D. in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件期间当选为北京高校学生自治联合会（北高联）主席。
description.en: During the Tiananmen Square protests, he was elected as the chairman of the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件期间担任天安门广场绝食团副总指挥。
description.en: He served as the deputy commander-in-chief of the Tiananmen Square Hunger Strike Group during the Tiananmen Square protests.

relationships.target: 保卫天安门广场总指挥部

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件期间担任保卫天安门广场总指挥部副总指挥。
description.en: He served as the deputy commander-in-chief of the Headquarters for Defending Tiananmen Square during the Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件遭到镇压后，封从德被迫中断在中国的学业和生活，开始在中国大陆逃亡并最终流亡海外。
description.en: After the crackdown on the Tiananmen Square protests, Feng Congde was forced to interrupt his studies and life in China, becoming a fugitive within mainland China before eventually going into exile abroad.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，北京市公安局于1989年6月13日将封从德列为21名高自联骨干之一，进行全国通缉。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square protests, on June 13, 1989, the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau listed Feng Congde as one of the 21 core members of the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation and issued a nationwide warrant for his arrest.

description.zh-cn: 在高等研究应用学院宗教历史系学习期间，封从德师从施舟人教授。
description.en: While studying at the Department of Religious History at the École Pratique des Hautes Études, Feng Congde was a student of Professor Kristofer Schipper.

description.zh-cn: 1997年，封从德在莱顿大学研究儒家学说。
description.en: In 1997, Feng Congde researched Confucianism at Leiden University.

description.zh-cn: 2001年，封从德创建了《六四档案》网站，收录关于六四事件的资料。
description.en: In 2001, Feng Congde founded the website 'June Fourth Archive' to collect materials related to the Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 2011年，封从德创办了网络“孙文学校”。
description.en: In 2011, Feng Congde founded the online 'Sun Yat-sen School'.

position.zh-cn: 复校筹备组成员、主持者

description.zh-cn: 2013年，封从德成为天安门民主大学复校筹备组成员之一，并主持该项目。
description.en: In 2013, Feng Congde became a member of the preparatory group for the re-establishment of the Tiananmen University of Democracy and presides over the project.

description.zh-cn: 2019年6月2日，封从德准备由日本赴香港出席六四事件三十周年悼念晚会时，被香港特别行政区政府拒绝入境。
description.en: On June 2, 2019, when Feng Congde was preparing to travel from Japan to Hong Kong to attend the 30th anniversary memorial of the Tiananmen Square protests, he was denied entry by the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government.

description.en: Feng Congde is the author of the book 'June Fourth Diary: The Republic on the Square', which was completed in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 历史学家余英时为封从德的著作《六四日记——广场上的共和国》作序。
description.en: Historian Yu Ying-shih wrote the preface for Feng Congde's book 'June Fourth Diary: The Republic on the Square'.

description.zh-cn: 2014年8月，封从德在采访中公开批评王丹是中共暗中扶植的“明星领袖”以破坏民运，并指责其篡改历史。
description.en: In August 2014, Feng Congde publicly criticized Wang Dan in an interview, calling him a 'star leader' secretly promoted by the CCP to undermine the democracy movement and accusing him of distorting history.

description.zh-cn: 封从德是亲中华民国派人士，主张在中国共产党崩溃后，中国大陆应回归中华民国。
description.en: Feng Congde is a pro-Republic of China activist, advocating that mainland China should return to the Republic of China after the collapse of the Communist Party of China.

description.en: On June 8, 1989, the Beijing Municipal People's Government announced the dissolution of the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation.

description.en: In May 1989, Feng Congde was awarded a five-year Ph.D. scholarship by Boston University.
